description: a blonde guy, a guy with black hair, playing football on a green field
text:
Leo: Pass me the ball!
Lucas: Here you go!

description: the blonde guy kicking the ball towards the guy with black hair, both running on the field
the blonde guy dribbling the ball past the guy with black hair, with a goalpost in the background
text:
Leo: Can't catch me!
Lucas: I'll get you next time!

description: the guy with black hair trying to steal the ball from the blonde guy, with spectators cheering in the background
text:
Lucas: Give me that ball!
Leo: Not so fast!

description: the blonde guy attempting a trick shot, with the guy with black hair looking surprised
both guys high-fiving each other in celebration, with a sunset in the background
text:
Leo: Great game!
Lucas: We make a great team!
